description: A plugable userbot with lots of features and special security modules

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API_ID get from my.telegram.org OR @Api_ScrapperRoBot

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API_HASH key get from my.telegram.org OR @Api_ScrapperRoBot

STRING_SESSION.description: Your TELETHON string Session get your string session from https://replit.com/@loverboyXD/SESSIONSTRING-GEN#main.py

NAME.description: Your Alive Name which will display on .alive

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your bot username get from @botfather without '@'

A_PIC.description: Custom Picture in Alive use Telegraph link

PM_TEXT.description: Text which you wanna to show in PM

BOT_PIC.description: Telegraph link of picture with you want to show in assistance bot

SUDO_USERS.description: Users to whom u wanna as sudo users

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your Heroku app name paste here too

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: your Private group id it must start from -100
